No American should be subject to being fired simply because of who they love. But for #LGBTQ Americans in many states, that is their daily reality. Proud to join so many Americans in taking a stand by doing my part to pass the #EqualityAct.

We’ve made a lot of progress in recent years, but the reality is that many still face discrimination because of who they are and the people they love. 

Today, we're voting on the #EqualityAct to finally put an end to this. pic.twitter.com/o9Sv6AWDus
